body_html: @skye Sure I'll give it a try, can't give no promises though since I have no control over the environment. It runs inside in a docker container (as far as I know) which is being created and destroyed every time I execute the code. Think of it sth equivalent of google cloud. Let me see what I can collect and I'll get back to you guys. Thanks for the advice.
